## Image Analysis: TCGAData

#### Setting up environment

```{r}
#| output: False
renv::init()
renv::snapshot()
renv::status()

```

#### Setting up libraries

```{r}
#| output: False
library(BiocManager)
library(MOFA2)
library(remotes)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(SpatialExperiment)
library(SpatialFeatureExperiment)
library(MultiAssayExperiment)
library(curatedTCGAData)
library(dplyr)
library(spatstat)
library(moments)
library(pracma)
library(HistoImageR)



```

#### Load in TCGA CRC data

```{r}
#| output: False
# Load COAD data with multiple assays
coad_mae <- curatedTCGAData(
    diseaseCode = "COAD",
    assays = c("RNASeq2GeneNorm", "Methylation450K", "miRNASeqGene"),
    version = "2.1.1",
    dry.run = FALSE
)
# Load READ data (rectal)
read_mae <- curatedTCGAData(
    diseaseCode = "READ",
    assays = c("RNASeq2GeneNorm", "Methylation450K", "miRNASeqGene"),
    version = "2.1.1",
    dry.run = FALSE
)

# Combine COAD + READ
crc_tcga <- c(coad_mae, read_mae)



```

#### Clinical Metadata

```{r}
#| output: False
clinical_crc_tcga <- colData(crc_tcga)
glimpse(clinical_crc_tcga)
```
